mapper.select: create table batch01 as SELECT SESS_DT, round(sum(pay)/100000000) as PD_BUY_AM FROM (SELECT to_char(to_date(SESS_DT),'MM') as SESS_DT, sum(PD_BUY_AM*PD_BUY_CT) as pay FROM PCSM group by SESS_DT) group by SESS_DT order by SESS_DT

create table batch02 as SELECT SESS_DT, sum(sumCNT) as PD_BUY_CT FROM (SELECT to_char(to_date(SESS_DT),'MM') as SESS_DT, sum(PD_BUY_CT) as sumCNT FROM PCSM group by SESS_DT) group by SESS_DT order by SESS_DT
create table batch03 as SELECT CLAC1_NM , round(sum(PD_BUY_AM*PD_BUY_CT)/100000000) as PD_BUY_AM FROM PCSM group by CLAC1_NM
create table batch04 as SELECT CLAC1_NM , sum(PD_BUY_CT) as PD_BUY_CT FROM PCSM group by CLAC1_NM

create table batch05 as select * from (select PD_NM, PD_C, PD_BRA_NM, CLAC2_NM, (max(PD_BUY_AM)) as PD_BUY_MAM, (sum(PD_BUY_CT)) as TOT_PD_BUY_CT, (sum(PD_BUY_AM*PD_BUY_CT)) as TOT_SALES from PCSM where PD_C IN (select PD_C from pcsm group by PD_C ) group by PD_NM, PD_C, PD_BRA_NM, CLAC2_NM order by TOT_PD_BUY_CT desc) where rownum <= 5
create table batch06 as select * from (select kwd_nm, sum(search_cnt) as search_cnt from search group by kwd_nm order by search_cnt desc) where rownum <= 8

create table batch07 as select SESS_DT, round(Female/100000000) as PD_BUY_CT, round(Male/100000000) as PD_BUY_CT2 from ( select * from ( select to_char(to_date(sess_dt),'MM') as sess_dt, clnt_gender, pd_buy_am from pcsm ) pivot (sum(pd_buy_am) for clnt_gender in('F' as Female,'M' as male)) order by sess_dt ) order by sess_dt
create table batch08 as SELECT CLNT_GENDER, sum(PD_BUY_CT) as PD_BUY_CT from PCSM group by CLNT_GENDER order by CLNT_GENDER

create table batch09 as select * FROM (select CLAC1_NM, CLNT_GENDER, PD_BUY_CT FROM PCSM) PIVOT (SUM(PD_BUY_CT) FOR CLAC1_NM IN ('babycare' as babycare, 'manclothes' as manclothes, 'others'as others, 'sportware' as sportware, 'sundries' as sundries, 'food' as food, 'electronics' as electronics, 'sports' as sports, 'housewares' as housewares, 'underware' as underware, 'necessaries' as necessaries, 'womenclothes' as womenclothes))

create table batch10 as SELECT PD_NM, PD_C, PD_BRA_NM, CLAC1_NM, CLAC2_NM, CLAC3_NM, SUM(TOT_PAG_VIEW_CT) as TOT_PAG_VIEW_CT, SUM(TOT_SESS_HR_V) as TOT_SESS_HR_V, sum(PD_BUY_CT) as PD_BUY_CT, max(pd_buy_am) as pd_buy_am, SUM(PD_BUY_AM*PD_BUY_CT) as tot_PD_BUY_AM FROM PCSM WHERE pd_C='687790' or pd_C='817486' or pd_C='748308' GROUP BY PD_NM,PD_C,PD_BRA_NM,CLAC1_NM, CLAC2_NM ,CLAC3_NM
create table batch11 as SELECT pd_c, CLNT_GENDER, sum(PD_BUY_CT) as PD_BUY_CT from PCSM where pd_C = 687790 or pd_C=817486 or pd_C=748308 group by CLNT_GENDER, pd_C order by CLNT_GENDER

create table batch12 as select * from (select clnt_age,PD_BUY_CT, pd_c FROM PCSM WHERE pd_C = 687790 or pd_C=817486 or pd_C=748308 ) PIVOT (SUM(PD_BUY_CT) FOR clnt_age IN ( '10' AS teen, '20' AS twenties, '30' AS thirties, '40' AS forties, '50' AS fifties, '60' AS sixties, '70' AS seventies, '80' AS eighties))
create table batch13 as select pd_C, ZON_NM, sum(pd_BUY_CT) as pd_BUY_CT from pcsm WHERE pd_C = 687790 or pd_C=817486 or pd_C=748308 group by pd_C, ZON_NM order by pd_C

create table batch14 as select * from (select PD_NM, PD_C, PD_BRA_NM, CLAC2_NM, (max(PD_BUY_AM)) as PD_BUY_MAM, (sum(PD_BUY_CT)) as TOT_PD_BUY_CT, (sum(PD_BUY_AM*PD_BUY_CT)) as TOT_SALES from PCSM where PD_C IN (select PD_C from pcsm group by PD_C ) group by PD_NM, PD_C, PD_BRA_NM, CLAC2_NM order by pd_C) where rownum <= 300
